Define Documentation

#define GEOXML_PARAMETER_GROUP ( seq   )     ((GeoXmlParameterGroup*)(seq))

Cast from a GeoXmlSequence to a GeoXmlParameterGroup.

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct geoxml_parameter_group GeoXmlParameterGroup

The GeoXmlParameterGroup struct contains private data only, and should be accessed using the functions below.

Function Documentation

GeoXmlParameters* geoxml_parameter_group_instanciate ( GeoXmlParameterGroup *  parameter_group  ) 

Instanciate parameter_group, appending a new instances (which is a clone of the first instance) to the list of instances.

gboolean geoxml_parameter_group_deinstanciate ( GeoXmlParameterGroup *  parameter_group  ) 

Remove the last instance.

int geoxml_parameter_group_get_instance ( GeoXmlParameterGroup *  parameter_group,
GeoXmlSequence **  parameters,
gulong  index 
)

Get group's parameters list.

See also:
GeoXmlParameters

glong geoxml_parameter_group_get_instances_number ( GeoXmlParameterGroup *  parameter_group  ) 

Get the number of instances of parameter_group.

If parameter_group is NULL returns 0.

GSList* geoxml_parameter_group_get_parameter_in_all_instances ( GeoXmlParameterGroup *  parameter_group,
guint  index 
)

Return the list of the parameters at index position in each instance of parameter_group.

If parameter_group is NULL returns NULL.

void geoxml_parameter_group_set_is_instanciable ( GeoXmlParameterGroup *  parameter_group,
gboolean  enable 
)

Set wheter parameter_group can have more than one instance.

If enable is FALSE, group is deinstanciated till it has only one one instance

void geoxml_parameter_group_set_expand ( GeoXmlParameterGroup *  parameter_group,
const gboolean  enable 
)

Set it parameter_group should be expanded by default, according to enable.

If parameter_group is NULL nothing is done.

gboolean geoxml_parameter_group_get_is_instanciable ( GeoXmlParameterGroup *  parameter_group  ) 

Get wheter parameter_group can have more than one instance.

If parameter_group is NULL returns FALSE.

gboolean geoxml_parameter_group_get_expand ( GeoXmlParameterGroup *  parameter_group  ) 

Return TRUE if parameter_group should be expanded by default, otherwise returns FALSE.

If parameter_group is NULL returns FALSE.
